backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three login/logout-related feature requirements (REQ-36, REQ-37, REQ-38) to App.tsx, covering auto-login on mount, logout button, and 10-digit mobile validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file for the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app, loading Nunito fonts from Google Fonts and mounting the React app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component implementing localStorage-based login (auto-login on mount if 'zweetiUser' exists, 10-digit mobile validation, logout with page reload) and the billing UI with invoice generation, daily totals, GST calculation, and date-wise sales report.
frontend/src/components/BillingForm.tsx: Billing form component with a 13-item Zweeti menu dropdown, quantity input, and an Add Item button that validates input and calls the onAddItem callback.
frontend/src/components/BillSummary.tsx: Bill summary component rendering a two-column item/price table with a tfoot total row, GST toggle, and subtotal/GST/grand-total breakdown that recalculates via useEffect when items or GST setting change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet using Tailwind CSS with ZWEETI Pro brand tokens (orange, green, blue), OKLCH CSS variables for theming, and custom component classes for cards, buttons, tables, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with ZWEETI brand colors, Nunito font, OKLCH-based semantic color tokens, and plugins for animation, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state and version history for the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app, documenting architectural decisions, existing features, and known issues.
